com.xtructure.xutil
Class RandomUtil

java.lang.Object
  com.xtructure.xutil.RandomUtil

public class RandomUtil
extends java.lang.Object

A collection of utility methods depending on randomness.

Author:
Luis Guimbarda

next

public static final <V extends java.lang.Comparable<V>> V next(Range<V> range,
                                                               java.lang.Class<V> cls)
Generates a uniformly random value within the given range. The following types are supported:
  • Boolean
  • Byte
  • Double
  • Float
  • Integer
  • Long
  • Short

Type Parameters:
V - the type of the range
Parameters:
range - the range from which to select a value
cls - the class of the range
Returns:
the selected value, or null if the type of the range is unsupported

randomlyAdjustParameterUniform

public static double randomlyAdjustParameterUniform(double parameter,
                                                    Range<java.lang.Double> range)
Adjusts the given double by adding a uniformly random generated double drawn from the [-1,1]. The adjusted value is within the given range.

Parameters:
parameter - the parameter
range - the range
Returns:
the adjusted value

randomlyAdjustParameterUniform

public static double randomlyAdjustParameterUniform(double parameter,
                                                    Range<java.lang.Double> range,
                                                    double perturbFactor)
Adjusts the given double by adding a uniformly random generated double drawn from the [-1,1] times the given perturbFactor. The adjusted value is within the given range.

Parameters:
parameter - the parameter
range - the range
perturbFactor - the perturb factor
Returns:
the adjusted value

normalizeWeights

public static boolean normalizeWeights(double[] weights)
Alters the given array of weights so that their sum is 1.0 while maintaining their relative proportions (i.e., divide each by the sum weight).

Parameters:
weights - the array to normalize
Returns:
true if the weights were adjusted, false if any weight is negative or their sum is 0.0.

normalizeWeights

public static boolean normalizeWeights(double[] weights,
                                       double smoothingFactor)
Normalize weights.

Parameters:
weights - the weights
smoothingFactor - the smoothing factor
Returns:
true, if successful

rouletteSelect

public static int rouletteSelect(int index,
                                 double[] normalizedWeights)
Performs a roulette selection on the given weight array, started with the given index. It is assumed that the given weight array is non-negative and has sum 1.0, as produced by normalizeWeights(double[]). If the array is not normalized, this method may not terminate.

Parameters:
index - the index on which roulette selection begins
normalizedWeights - the weights used for roulette selection
Returns:
the selected index

rouletteSelectUnnormalized

public static int rouletteSelectUnnormalized(int index,
                                             double[] weights)
Performs a roulette selection on the given weight array, started with the given index. The given weight array is normalized here, and if any weight is negative or their sum is 0.0, an index is selected uniformly.

Parameters:
index - the index on which roulette selection begins
weights - the weights used for roulette selection
Returns:
the selected index

normalizeWeights

public static <V,N extends java.lang.Number> java.util.Map<V,java.lang.Double> normalizeWeights(java.util.Map<V,N> weights)

Type Parameters:

Parameters:

smoothingFactor - the smoothing factor
Returns:
the map

rouletteSelect

public static <V> V rouletteSelect(java.util.Map<V,java.lang.Double> normalizedWeights)
Performs a roulette selection on the given weight map. It is assumed that the values of the given map are normalized, i.e., are non-negative and have sum 1.0. If the values are not, the behavior of this method is undefined.

Type Parameters:
V - the value type
Parameters:
normalizedWeights - the weights used for roulette selection
Returns:
the selected key

rouletteSelectUnnormalized

public static <V,N extends java.lang.Number> V rouletteSelectUnnormalized(java.util.Map<V,N> weights)
Roulette select unnormalized.

Type Parameters:
V - the value type
N - the number type
Parameters:
weights - the weights used for roulette selection
Returns:
the selected key
